name: Artificer
text:
You gain the Enchant Weapon ability:
Cost: 1 AP, 1 mana.
Gain 1 wound. Choose a weapon wielded by yourself or a nearby allied character. Until you recover, that weapon deals elemental damage instead of natural damage.

You gain the Enchant Armor ability:
Cost: 1 AP, 1 mana.
Gain 1 wound. Choose a piece of armor worn by yourself or a nearby allied character. Until you recover, that armor provides elemental armor instead of natural armor.
